title: [JIT] Passed-in parameter is not a 1D LongTensor when expected
body_html:
Operator-level tests fail. Example failure:

======================================================================
ERROR: test_repeat_single_number (__main__.TestAutogradGenerated)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3665, in do_test
    check(name)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3592, in check
    fn, (self_variable,) + args_variable)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3498, in check_against_reference
    outputs_test = func(*nograd_inputs)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3474, in script_fn
    return output_process_fn(CU.the_method(*tensors))
RuntimeError: 
Expected a 1D LongTensor:
operation failed in interpreter:

def the_method(i0):
    return i0.repeat(2)
           ~~~~~~~~~ <--- HERE

Affected tests:

  • test_repeat_single_number
  • test_reshape_1d
  • test_reshape_scalar_to_1d
  • test_view_1d
  • test_view_scalar_to_1d

body:
Operator-level tests fail. Example failure:

```
======================================================================
ERROR: test_repeat_single_number (__main__.TestAutogradGenerated)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3665, in do_test
    check(name)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3592, in check
    fn, (self_variable,) + args_variable)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3498, in check_against_reference
    outputs_test = func(*nograd_inputs)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3474, in script_fn
    return output_process_fn(CU.the_method(*tensors))
RuntimeError: 
Expected a 1D LongTensor:
operation failed in interpreter:

def the_method(i0):
    return i0.repeat(2)
           ~~~~~~~~~ <--- HERE
```
Affected tests:
- `test_repeat_single_number`
- `test_reshape_1d`
- `test_reshape_scalar_to_1d`
- `test_view_1d`
- `test_view_scalar_to_1d`
